attributes.action: Stop sky news and the others news rooms from being one sided
attributes.background: Sky news and other news rooms are being one sided over coming out the eu they need to stop the scaremongering on TV

rejection.details:
The Ofcom Code already makes provision about due impartiality in news broadcasting. You can find out more here:

http://stakeholders.ofcom.org.uk/broadcasting/broadcast-codes/broadcast-code/impartiality/
